text: Robert D. Siegel (born November 12, 1971) is an American screenwriter and film director. He's most known for his work on The Wrestler and The Founder. Siegel is a graduate of the University of Michigan who later became senior editor of The Onion from 1996 to 1999, and editor-in-chief from 1999 to 2003.Onion print editions, July 3–10, 1996, Oct. 14–21, 1999 He is married to actress Jen Cohn and has a son with her. ==Filmography== {|class="wikitable" |- !
